name: In-Between GGJ22
description:
discover the hidden mystery (past) of the abandoned humanoid factory on planet Earth. utilize strategically the revealed reality and the hidden reality. [W/Space] to jump [ASD] to move [C] to open and [mouse] to move the spotlight hint: use spotlight to explore your environment first!

programmers: Shenxin Jiang, Jerry Wan

designers: Hannah Zeng, Anastasia Ye

artists: Cynthia, Jun Zhou

technical artist & music: Albert Han
